ValidationRule.description: Validates contractor is not selected for Admin or Club Dispatcher profiles
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = "User Provisioning Request", FSL_Contractor__c = TRUE, OR( ISPICKVAL(FSL_Profile__c , "Club Dispatcher"), ISPICKVAL(FSL_Profile__c , "Admin") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: FSL Admins & Club Dispatchers cannot be contractors
